name: Eldrow - a Wordle Solver
description:
Edlrow is a Wordle Solver for Windows.

Eldrow can solve Wordle type puzzles with 5-10 letter words.

Impress your friends with how brainy you've suddenly got.

Or study how Eldrow solves Wordle to improve your own strategies! 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

A free game for Windows.

Play with keyboard or mouse.

If you like this, check out turkle

turkle

------------------------------------------------------------------------
